name: The Rise of Leif
description:
Join Leif on his Adventure to save his fellow plants! The evil robots are trying to destroy nature and must be stopped! With his trusty axe, Leif will punish his enemies, and save Nature!

A love letter to the NES Mega Man games, this is a very challenging action platformer, with a melee axe attack, and also (distance-limited) charge projectile, as well as special weapons to acquire from each of the (2) bosses!

Thanks to Input by jujuadams and offalynne virtually any controller is plug'n'play! Keyboard controls are there as well (space to jump, c to shoot), but controller highly recommended.

Art: FreddySquarepants

Audio: Capt Shred

The Rest: ModalModule
